mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBOARD (CATEGORY_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, SUMMARY, VIEWS, INSERT_USER_NO, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_USER_NO, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{categoryno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{views}, #{insertuserno}, NOW(), #{modifyuserno}, NOW())
INSERT INTO TBOARDFILE (BOARD_NO, FILE_NO, INSERT_USER_NO, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_USER_NO, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{fileNo}, #{insertUserNo}, NOW(), #{modifyUserNo}, NOW())

INSERT INTO TFILE (CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_SUB_NO, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_SAVE_NAME, FILE_PATH, DESCRIPTION, INSERT_USER_NO, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_USER_NO, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{categoryNo}, null, #{fileOriginName}, #{fileSaveName}, #{filePath}, null, #{insertUserNo}, NOW(), #{modifyUserNo}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT tb.BOARD_NO, tb.TITLE, tb.INSERT_DATE, tb.VIEWS, tu.USER_NAME FROM TBOARD tb LEFT JOIN TUSER tu ON tb.INSERT_USER_NO = tu.USER_NO WHERE tb.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryno} AND (#{search} IS NULL OR tb.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')) ORDER BY tb.BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBOARD tb LEFT JOIN TUSER tu ON tb.INSERT_USER_NO = tu.USER_NO WHERE tb.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryno} AND (#{search} IS NULL OR tb.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))

SELECT tb.CONTENT, tb.TITLE, tb.VIEWS, tb.MODIFY_DATE, tu.USER_NAME, tu.NATIONLITY, tb.INSERT_USER_NO, tb.SUMMARY FROM TBOARD tb,TUSER tu WHERE tb.INSERT_USER_NO = tu.USER_NO AND BOARD_NO = #{boardno}

SELECT tu.USER_NAME, tc.CONTENT, tf.FILE_SAVE_NAME, tc.COMMENT_NO FROM TBOARDCOMMENT tbc JOIN TUSER tu ON tbc.INSERT_USER_NO = tu.USER_NO JOIN TCOMMENT tc ON tbc.COMMENT_NO = tc.COMMENT_NO LEFT JOIN TFILE tf ON tu.File_NO = tf.File_NO WHERE tbc.BOARD_NO = #{boardno}
mapper.update: update TBOARD set TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, SUMMARY = null MODIFY_DATE = now() where BOARD_NO = #{boardno}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO FROM TBOARDFILE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardno}
SELECT COMMENT_NO FROM TBOARDCOMMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBOARD tb LEFT JOIN TUSER tu ON tb.INSERT_USER_NO = tu.USER_NO WHERE tb.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryno}
